text: قالوا۟ يموسى اما ان تلقى واما ان نكون اول من القى

translations.translation: They said: "Either you cast (your spell), O Moses, or we shall cast it first."
The magicians said: "Moses, will you throw down or shall we be the first to throw?"
They said, "Moses, would you be the first to show your skill or should we be the first to throw down our devices?"
They said, “O Moosa, either you throw first – or shall we throw first?”
They said: "O Musa! Either you throw first or we be the first to throw"
They said: O Musa! will you cast, or shall we be the first who cast down?
They said, 'Moses, either thou wilt cast, or we shall be the first to cast.'
They said: O Moses! Either throw first, or let us be the first to throw?
They said, "Moses, will you throw down first, or shall we be the first to throw down?"
They said: either thou cast down, or we shall be the first to cast down.
They said, ‘O Moses! Will you throw first, or shall we?’
They said: "O Moses! whether wilt thou that thou throw (first) or that we be the first to throw?"
They said:"O Musa (Moses)! Either you throw first or we be the first to throw?"
They said to Moses: 'Will you throw down or shall we be the first?
They said, “O Moses, either you throw, or we will be the first to throw.”
They said, "O Moses, either you throw or we will be the first to throw."
[20:65] They said, ‘O Moses, you choose: either cast, your staff first, or we shall be the first to cast’, their staff.
(They said) the magicians said to Moses: (0 Moses! Either throw first) either you throw your staff to the ground first, (or let us be the first to throw?)

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: ثم لما أتى السحرة صافين إلى المجلس على الوجه الذي أمروا { قَالُواْ } من فرط عتوهم واستيلائهم: { يٰمُوسَىٰ } نادوه استحقاراً واستذلالاً { إِمَّآ أَن تُلْقِيَ } أولاً ما تلقيتَ وجئتَ به في مقابلتنا { وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنْ أَلْقَىٰ } [طه: 65] ما تلقينا في مقابلتك، فالأمران عندنا سيَّان؛ لأننا عصبة ومعنا جميع هذه الخلائق، وأنت ضعيفُ ليس معك إلا أخوك

commentaries.author: ابن عجيبة
commentaries.text: ثم طلبوا المعارضة، فقالوا: { يا موسى إِما أن تُلقي } ما تلقيه أولاً، { وإِما أن نكون أول من ألقى } ما نلقيه
